page.title: 06MR. OLIVER EVERETT
page.content: by Richard,David,Helen Mr.Oliver Everett has been the librarian at Windsor Castle since February 1985;he was deputy for 12 months before that.40% of his time is spent in caring for the archives in the Round Tower;less than 10% on the book collection and the rest in helping special researchers and historians allowed access to the papers. {FAVOURITE BOOK *}A Dance to the Music of Time by Anthony Powell (12 volumes) {SPARE TIME ACTIVITIES *}Playing real tennis, squash,racquets;gardening {HIS VIEW OF 1985 *}Great achievements are rapid travel, space travel, computers. Sad points are, little progress made in combating terrorism and violence. People in Africa are starving while Europeans have too much of everything.
